job.title: Full Stack Engineer for NLP startup
job.description:
Working with an exciting startup in the AI space, you will work as part of the team supporting the development and enhancement of our SaaS product.
On a daily basis you’ll be building out new app features, testing your work and deploying this to our cloud infrastructure. You’ll help map out the roadmap for the product with key stakeholders and manage your
deliverables.

Responsibilities
● Building out new features, from API and database structure right through to the UI.
● Ensure adherence to correct processes, clean code, and best practices.
● Oversee and maintain web servers, domains and SSLs.
● Commitment to deliver features on time.
● Support and maintain existing products.
● Work in a high paced environment, solve complex problems, and 
implement the most efficient solutions.

Experience and Skills
● Minimum 4 years of experience
● Candidate must possess strong skills with these technologies: C#, .Net 6+, SQL, MS SQL Server
and Vue JS
● DevOps experience, provisioning services, managing database servers with Azure is advantageous.
● Experience with version control and CI/CD systems (Git, GitHub, Actions, Terraform), essential.
● Strong communication, time management, problem solving, and decision making skills, essential.
● Great attention to detail, essential.
● Passion for new web technologies, essential.
● An appreciation for design and user experience would be great

customFields.generatedDescriptionAI:
We are a fast-growing NLP startup looking for a talented Full Stack Engineer to join our team. This is a long-term project with a duration of more than 6 months. As a Full Stack Engineer, you will play a crucial role in developing our chatbot platform and integrating AI models.

Key skills required for this position include expertise in SQL, .NET Framework, Vue.js, Full-Stack Development, API Development, and Azure DevOps. Experience with machine learning and AI model integration, specifically ChatGPT API Integration, is highly desired.

To apply for this role, please submit a detailed proposal outlining how you can contribute to our project. We would like to see examples of your past completed projects, so please provide relevant links. Show us your ability to build scalable and efficient solutions, and highlight your experience with NLP and chatbot platforms.

We look forward to reviewing your proposals and discussing this exciting opportunity further.
